listitem.para:
whether to send a CISCO_UNITY payload to the peer we are initiating to. Acceptable values are: no (the default) and yes.
It is recommended to leave this option unset, unless the remote peer (Cisco) requires it. This is an experimental option. It does not modify local behaviour. It is expected the remote peer might behave differently when it receives this vendor id. This option might be removed in a future release.
